scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run prepare-deploy && ng deploy --base-href=/TesourarIA/ --name='TesourarIA' --email='noreply@github.com'
scripts.prepare-deploy: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const browserDir='dist/cashlog-dashboard/browser'; const distDir='dist/cashlog-dashboard'; if(fs.existsSync(browserDir)) { const files=fs.readdirSync(browserDir, {withFileTypes: true}); files.forEach(file=>{ const src=path.join(browserDir, file.name); const dest=path.join(distDir, file.name); if(file.isDirectory()) { if(!fs.existsSync(dest)) fs.mkdirSync(dest, {recursive: true}); fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(f=>{ fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src, f), path.join(dest, f)); }); } else { fs.copyFileSync(src, dest); } }); const indexPath=path.join(distDir, 'index.html'); const dest404=path.join(distDir, '404.html'); if(fs.existsSync(indexPath)) { fs.copyFileSync(indexPath, dest404); console.log('Files copied from browser/ to root and 404.html created'); } }" || true
scripts.clean:
node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process'); try{execSync('git worktree remove gh-pages',{stdio:'ignore'});}catch(e){}
try{execSync('git branch -D gh-pages',{stdio:'ignore'});}catch(e){}" || exit 0
